content.rendered:
Four Colours

Where are lions found?
Where do their cubs stay?
Who is faster, a lion or a lioness?

Lions are the second-largest cats in the world! Come, discover the world of lions! Valerie Bodden tells you about where they live, how they look, how much they sleep and play and much more…

This book has amazing photographs in colour and fascinating facts about lions, African and Asian, male and female, at play and at rest. Also included is a story from folklore about why lions roar.
